tracer
Class Tracer

java.lang.Object

                  tracer.Tracer
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class Tracer
extends java.awt.Frame

The main class. Displays the window and coordinates the raytracing.

Constructor Detail

Tracer

public Tracer()
Method Detail

loadScene

public void loadScene()
Loads and parses the file "scene.txt". Adds the things it recognizes to the `scene' and `lights' ArrayLists.

paint

public void paint(java.awt.Graphics gr)
Redraws the offscreenImage onto the screen.

render

public void render()
The actual raytracing starts here. Initializes the pixel buffers and raytraces each pixel. Redraws the screen each time an additional 8 rows have been rendered.

tracePixel

public Vec3 tracePixel(int x,
                       int y)
Given (x,y) coordinates of the pixel to be traced, constructs the primary ray, raytraces it (by calling Ray.trace) and returns the result (the color for the pixel).

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
